text: ane manavine jyare pana ko'i takalipha pahonce che, to te vinamrata potana palanaharane pokare che, pachi jyare allaha ta'ala tene potani pasethi krpa api de che, to te (krpa malya) pahela je du'a karato hato, tene bhuli jaya che ane allaha ta'alana bhagidara theravava lage che, jenathi (bijane pana) tena margathi dura kari de, tame kahi do! Ke potana inkarano labha thoda divasa haju uthavi lo, (chevate) tum jahannami loko manthi thavano che
